title: Glen 'Big Baby' Davis | Ep 144  | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Glen 'Big Baby' Davis | Ep 144  | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
ALL THE SMOKE continues to bring the big-time guests. On episode 144, Matt and Stak are joined by former Celtic & Clipper, Glen 'Big Baby' Davis to discuss his rollercoaster career. Davis discusses his time with the Celtics, winning the 2008 titles with the 'Big 3' and talks about the end of his career in LA. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
